snippet: Access to an intelligence-sharing system had to be restricted after America’s biggest leak of classified information, a former official said at the sentencing hearing of Pfc. Bradley Manning.
abstract: Former State Dept official Susan Swart, testifying at sentencing hearing of Pfc Bradley Manning, says Washington had to restrict access to an intelligence-sharing system after America’s biggest leak of classified information to WikiLeaks.
lead_paragraph: Access to an intelligence-sharing system had to be restricted after America’s biggest leak of classified information, a former official said at the sentencing hearing of Pfc. Bradley Manning.

headline.main: Maryland: Sentencing Hearing Continues for Manning
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Sentencing Hearing Continues For Manning
